title: Infections are levelling off
subtitle: Percentage testing positive for COVID-19, England
commentary: In recent weeks, the positivity rate in England has shown signs of levelling.

title: Deaths in England and Wales are rising
subtitle: Deaths registered by week involving COVID-19, England and Wales, 28 Dec 2019 to 27 Nov 2020
commentary: The number of deaths involving COVID-19 in England and Wales has risen for the 11th consecutive week.

title: Personal well-being scores remained stable
subtitle: Overall, how satisfied are you with your life nowadays?
commentary: Average personal well-being scores for life satisfaction (6.8) increased slightly compared with last week
